DOC.brief_summary: GSK961081 novel bifunctional molecule combine muscarinic antagonism beta2-agonism single molecule development treatment chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) . This randomised , open-label , six-way crossover , single dose study . This study evaluate drug delivery systemic pharmacokinetics GSK961081 follow concurrent administration GSK961081 fluticasone furoate via dry powder inhaler ( DPI ) comparison GSK961081 DISKUS . There six treatment period 7 day washout period study . Subjects attend unit morning dose resident 12 hour post administration . All subject receive six treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Pharmacokinetics GSK961081 Fluticasone Furoate When Administered Alone Combination
